get.summary: Get details about a file, including a pre-signed URL for download
get.description: Get information and details for the specified file ID, including metadata and a pre-signed URL for file download. The URL can be used as a curl command or directly with S3.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to retrieve.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

patch.summary: Update a file entry in GDS and get temporary credentials for upload
patch.description: Update a file entry in GDS. Returns temporary credentials for file upload directly to S3 when the include=objectStoreAccess parameter is used. Note that the currently supported changes to the file resource are updating the file type and the underlying content.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to be updated.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to include in the response ([include=[totalItemCount]).Example: include=totalItemCount

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

delete.description: Permanently delete a file entry and its underlying content

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to delete.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.summary: Create a file entry in GDS and get temporary credentials for upload
post.description: Create a file entry in GDS. Returns temporary credentials for file upload directly to S3 when the include=objectStoreAccess parameter is used. Volume ID or volume name is required for file creation. If a folder path is provided and does not exist, GDS creates the folder path in the appropriate account automatically.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to include in the response ([include=[totalItemCount]).Example: include=totalItemCount

409.description: A conflict was found. Make sure the new File doesn't already exist.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.description: Given a volumeId or volume name, get a list of files accessible by the JWT. The default sort returned is alphabetical, ascending. The default page size is 10 items

parameters.name: volume.id
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated volume IDs to include in the list

parameters.name: volume.name
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated volume names to include in the list

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated paths to include in the list. Value can use wildcards (e.g. /a/b/c/*) or exact matches (e.g. /a/b/c/d/).

parameters.name: isUploaded
parameters.description: Optional field to filter by Uploaded files

parameters.name: archiveStatus
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated Archive Statuses to include in the list

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Optional field to specify if files should be returned recursively in and under the specified paths, or only directly in the specified paths

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

delete.description: This endpoint will be deprecated with the EarlyAccess launch. Utilize DELETE: v1/files/{fileId} instead.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to delete.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Archives a file to a lower storage cost tier.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to be archived.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Unarchive a file from a lower storage cost tier.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to be unarchived.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.description: Given a volumeId or volume name, get a list of folders accessible by the JWT. The default sort returned is alphabetical, ascending. The default page size is 10 items

parameters.name: volume.id
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated volume IDs to include in the list

parameters.name: volume.name
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated volume names to include in the list

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated paths to include in the list. Value can use wildcards (e.g. /a/b/c/*) or exact matches (e.g. /a/b/c/d/).

parameters.name: jobStatuses
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated JobStatuses to include in the list

parameters.name: acls
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated acls to include in the list

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Optional field to specify if folders should be returned recursively in and under the specified paths, or only directly in the specified paths

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.summary: Create a folder in GDS and receive credentials for upload
post.description: Create a folder entry in GDS. Returns temporary credentials for folder upload directly to S3 when the include=objectStoreAccess parameter is used. Volume ID or volume name is required for folder creation. If a folder path is provided and does not exist, GDS automatically creates the folder path in the appropriate account.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to include in the response ([include=[totalItemCount]).Example: include=totalItemCount

409.description: A conflict was found. Make sure the new Folder doesn't already exist.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get information about a folder in GDS.
get.description: Get information for the specified folder ID.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the folder to retrieve.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

patch.summary: Update a folder content or acl
patch.description: Update an existing folder in GDS and return upload credentials for that folder. Changes to the folder name and other metadata are not supported at this time.  Optionally overwrite the acl for this folder if acl is provided in the request.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the folder to be updated.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to include in the response ([include=[totalItemCount]).Example: include=totalItemCount

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the folder to be deleted.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Archives a folder to a lower storage cost tier.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the folder to be archived.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Unarchive a folder from a lower storage cost tier.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the folder to be unarchived.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get status of a folder upload in GDS
get.description: Get status of a folder upload in GDS.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the folder related to the upload session.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the upload session

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.summary: Complete a folder upload in GDS
post.description: Complete a folder upload in GDS.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the folder related to the upload session.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the upload session

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The request body

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

parameters.name: tenantId

post.summary: Create a volume in GDS and receive temporary credentials for upload
post.description: Create a volume in GDS to hold folders and files. Returns upload credentials to the root folder of the volume when the include=objectStoreAccess parameter is used. You must create a volume prior to uploading files or folders.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to include in the response ([include=[totalItemCount]).Example: include=totalItemCount

409.description: A conflict was found. Make sure the new Volume doesn't already exist.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get information for the specified volume ID or volume name

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the volume to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Volume to be deleted.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

ArchiveStatuses.description: The valid Archive Status values for files in GDS

id.description: A unique identifier for this File

volumeId.description: The unique identifier of the volume where the file resides

volumeName.description: The name of the volume where the file resides

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for this File's Tenant

subTenantId.description: The unique identifier for this File's Sub Tenant

timeCreated.description: The date & time this File was created, in GDS

timeModified.description: The date & time this File was updated, in GDS

inheritedAcl.description: The inherited list of Id(s) that have access to this File

urn.description: The Universal Resource Name, unique to this File

isUploaded.description: The current upload state of the File

timeArchived.description: The date & time this File was archived

presignedUrl.description: The presigned Url allowing access to this File

code.description: Error code that uniquely identifies the type of error that occurred

message.description: Description of the error that occurred

details.description: Additional details for conditions that caused the error

ObjectStorageCredentialsResponse.description: The temporaryUploadCredentials/objectStorageCredentialsResponse will be deprecated. Use objectStoreAccess/awsS3TemporaryUploadCredentials instead.

accessKey.description: Access key for use with AWS S3

secretKey.description: Secret key for use with AWS S3

sessionToken.description: Token for use with AWS S3

region.description: AWS region the folder will/does reside in

bucketName.description: AWS bucket the folder will/does reside in

uploadLocation.description: AWS upload location for this folder

access_Key_Id.description: Access key for use with AWS S3

secret_Access_Key.description: Secret key for use with AWS S3

session_Token.description: Token for use with AWS S3

region.description: AWS region the folder will/does reside in

bucketName.description: AWS bucket the folder will/does reside in

keyPrefix.description: AWS upload location for this folder

ObjectStoreAccess.description: ObjectStoreAccess to get the temporaryCredentials per provider

id.description: A unique identifier for this File

volumeId.description: The unique identifier of the volume where the file resides

volumeName.description: The name of the volume where the file resides

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for this File's Tenant

subTenantId.description: The unique identifier for this File's Sub Tenant

timeCreated.description: The date & time this File was created, in GDS

timeModified.description: The date & time this File was updated, in GDS

inheritedAcl.description: The inherited list of Id(s) that have access to this File

urn.description: The Universal Resource Name, unique to this File

isUploaded.description: The current upload state of the File

timeArchived.description: The date & time this File was archived

name.description: Name of the file to be uploaded, case sensitive.

volumeId.description: Volume ID to which the file will be uploaded

folderPath.description: Optional folder path where the file will be uploaded to

type.description: Optional file content type, e.g. text/plain, application/json

itemCount.description: Number of items included in the page

nextPageToken.description: PageToken for the next paged list

prevPageToken.description: PageToken for the previous paged list

lastPageToken.description: PageToken for the last paged list. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

totalItemCount.description: Total number of items in all pages. Only included when requested

totalPageCount.description: Total number of pages. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

FileArchiveRequest.description: FileArchiveRequest to specify the Storage Tier

restoreSpeed.description: The desired Restore Speed to move the File to the Standard Storage Tier. Valid values are Economy and Standard.

JobStatus.description: The valid Job Status values for folders in GDS

id.description: A unique identifier for this Folder

volumeId.description: The unique identifier for this Folder's Volume

volumeName.description: The name of this Folder's Volume

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Folders's Tenant

subTenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Folder's Sub Tenant

urn.description: The Universal Resource Name, unique to this Folder

path.description: The (GDS) folder path to this Folder

acl.description: The list of directly specified Id(s) that have access to this Folder

inheritedAcl.description: The inherited list of Id(s) that have access to this Folder

timeCreated.description: The date & time this Folder was created, in GDS

timeModified.description: The date & time this Folder was updated, in GDS

itemCount.description: Number of items included in the page

nextPageToken.description: PageToken for the next paged list

prevPageToken.description: PageToken for the previous paged list

lastPageToken.description: PageToken for the last paged list. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

totalItemCount.description: Total number of items in all pages. Only included when requested

totalPageCount.description: Total number of pages. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

name.description: Folder name, unique to this path, for the folder being created

folderPath.description: Path from the root folder to the location for the folder being created; must start and end with '/'

volumeId.description: The unique identifier for this Folder's Volume

volumeName.description: The unique name for the Folder's Volume

acl.description: Optional array to replace the acl on the resource.

folderUrn.description: The Universal Resource Name of the Folder associated with the Session

timeCreated.description: The date & time this Session was created, in GDS

timeCredentialsExpire.description: The date & time this upload session expires

timeClosed.description: The date & time this Session was closed, in GDS

timeCompleted.description: The date & time this Session was completed, in GDS

expectedSessionFileCount.description: User-defined count used for reconciling files uploaded when closing the session

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
